image_0.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting regally atop a pile of cushions, with the blue sky shining through a sheer curtain behind him.

image_1.alt: Blurry photo of Gizmo the cat being held aloft by Mark as he hunts for a moth. Only Gizmo's face is in focus.

image_2.alt: Gizmo the cat looking up at the camera from atop a small cat tower.

image_3.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on his knitted mat, with a sunlit window behind him.

image_4.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on his heated blanket, looking as though he's posing for a portrait.

image_5.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on a bookshelf in partial sunlight, looking inquisitively up at the camera.

image_6.alt: Gizmo the cat as a kitten, sitting at the base of a cat tower.

image_7.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up asleep on a blanket stretched over Mark's knees.

image_8.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on a blanket stretched over Mark's knees, with his belly turned up, cheekily looking at the camera.

image_9.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up asleep with his paw stretched out and placed on Mark's hand.

image_10.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing in front of a fireplace, looking at the camera with large eyes.

image_11.alt: Gizmo the cat lying asleep over Mark's knee in front of the fireplace, with both his front paws stretched way out in front of him.

image_12.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up behind a curtain in the sunlight, looking at the camera.

image_13.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up next to Mark's hip in bed, looking at the camera.

image_14.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up asleep on a blanket with his paw covering his face.

image_15.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing in sunlight shining through a set of blinds, projecting lines of shadow onto him.

image_16.alt: Close up shot of Gizmo the cat's face as he watches the lawn.

image_17.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping on the carpet in the sunlight next to a red plastic rod that is part of one of his toys.

image_18.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on Mark's desk, looking back at the camera with curtains behind him.

image_19.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up in the sunlight against Mark's outstretched feet, with his ears brightly backlit by the sun.

image_20.alt: Close up shot of Gizmo the cat as he looks out of a window.

image_21.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on Mark's shoulder, sniffing at a wall.

image_22.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on Mark's desk next to his laptop, beneath a lamp, looking back over his shoulder dramatically.

image_23.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he looks out a window.

image_24.alt: Close up of half Gizmo the cat's face in the sunlight.

image_25.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on his back on a bed, cheekily showing his belly.

image_26.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting in a paper bag in the sunlight, looking directly up at the camera.

image_27.alt: Gizmo the cat asleep on his blue knitted mat.

image_28.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting behind a curtain, enjoying the afternoon sunlight and looking up past the camera.

image_29.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he lies on his blue knitted mat.

image_30.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he lies in his hammock on top of his cat tower.

image_31.alt: Gizmo the cat hiding in a red and blue plastic shopping bag, looking out with very large eyes.

image_32.alt: Gizmo the cat and Mark asleep together on the couch in the afternoon sun.

image_33.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting politely on his knitted mat on Mark's desk, looking at the camera.

image_34.alt: Gizmo the cat crouching in a paper bag.

image_35.alt: Extreme close up of Gizmo the cat's face, with very large eyes.

image_36.alt: Gizmo the cat lying in his tunnel, with very large eyes.

image_37.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping in the sunlight next to a laundry basket, breathing slowly.

image_38.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping on his knitted mat and breathing slowly.

image_39.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he happily kneads a red dressing gown.

image_40.alt: Gizmo the cat's eyes going from normal sized to very big.

image_41.alt: Gizmo the cat's face barely peeking out from beneath a jacket that is laid over a full laundry basket.

image_42.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing on his blue knitted mat next to a sunlit window, looking away from the window.

image_43.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping in the sunlight on his blue knitted mat, with his paws stretched out towards the camera and his face resting against a pile of books on alternative medicine.

image_44.alt: Gizmo the cat standing on Mark's legs, looking off to the side with very large eyes.

image_45.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on top of a red jacket, which is draped over a laundry basket.

image_46.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a red dressing gown, looking grumpily at the camera without lifting his head.

image_47.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on his back on a blanket, offering his belly for some belly rubs.

image_48.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting very alertly by Mark's feet, looking at the camera.

image_49.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up in a heart shape on a red jacket.

image_50.alt: Gizmo the cat looking sleepily at the camera while loafing on his sleeping mat.

image_51.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting in his tunnel in the sunlight, looking to the side out of its entrance.

image_52.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on a windowsill, looking at the camera.

image_53.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on top of a cat tower, looking up at the camera with big eyes.

image_54.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on the carpet, licking his nose.

image_55.alt: Close up photo of Gizmo the cat in a tucked loaf on the carpet, staring at the floor in front of him with very big eyes.

image_56.alt: Gizmo the cat lying in front of a lit fireplace, with his front paws stretched out to rest on an insulated mitt, looking back at the camera.

image_57.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he sleeps on a blanket.

image_58.alt: Gizmo the cat standing on his hind legs, holding Mark's hand still while he eats a treat from it.

image_59.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting in a plasting shopping bag, looking out past the camera with big eyes.

image_60.alt: Gizmo the cat's head and front legs poking out from his spot on a blanket on Mark's lap, beneath his desk.

image_61.alt: Gizmo the cat nested in a fluffy white blanket.

image_62.alt: Gizmo the cat's sleeping face poking out from a nest in a fluffy white and blue blanket, with his nose and tail covering his nose.

image_63.alt: Gizmo the cat lying in a box on its side. He barely fits, with his tail and back feet poking out.

image_64.alt: Gizmo the cat in a half-sphinx in the sunlight, looking large due to the low angle, with a toy mouse in the foreground.

image_65.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a blue blanket over a lap, looking sleepily at the camera.

image_66.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on a blue blanket on a bet, along the gap made between Mark's legs, with his front paws outstretched towards the camera.

image_67.alt: Gizmo the cat lying inside a sunlit paper bag.

image_68.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing on a blue blanket over a lap, looking up at the camera in golden light.

image_69.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on the carpet, looking almost directly up at the camera, with his front paws just barely visible beneath him.

image_70.alt: Gizmo the cat lying in a sunlit paper bag, with one paw stretched out towards the camera.

image_71.alt: Gizmo the cat stretched out on his side, lying in partial sunlight on Mark's legs on the couch.

image_72.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he tries to sleep on a blue blanket, with a paw covering his nose.

image_73.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a blur blanket, exposing his belly and looking cheekily at the camera.

image_74.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing on the armrest of a sofa, with his paw resting over his front paws.

image_75.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on top of a cat tower next to a window, caught mid blink and as he licks his nose.

image_76.alt: Gizmo the cat looking back past the camera while standing in front of a wire mesh keeping him from leaving the house, with a tiled area and a lawn behind it.

image_77.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on his side in a patch of sunlight on the floor, stretching his front paws out.

image_78.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing in the sunlight in front of a wire mesh keeping him from leaving the house, intently watching the outdoors.

image_79.alt: Gizmo the cat standing up to eating a treat out from between Mark's thumb and forefinger, using one of his front paws to gently hold Mark's hand in place.

image_80.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting in the sunlight in front of a wire mesh keeping him from leaving the house, intently watching the outdoors as he sniffs the air.

image_81.alt: Gizmo the cat asleep in a hammock on top of a cat tower, next to a window.

image_82.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a blanket on a bed, getting some belly rubs.

image_83.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up in the gap between Mark's knees as he lies on the couch.

image_84.alt: Gizmo the cat mid-lick, standing up on his hind legs to eat a treat out from between Mark's thumb and forefinger, using one of his front paws to gently hold Mark's hand in place.

image_85.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on top of a cat tower, looking up at the camera with his head tilted to the right.

image_86.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing on a pile of scarves in a dimly lit room, looking up at the camera with big eyes.

image_87.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat looking at the camera while curled up on a blanket, with his tail covering his nose and mouth.

image_88.alt: Gizmo the cat lying next to Mark's leg on the couch with his paws stretch out beneath his chin while he looks past the camera to keep an eye on the outdoors.

image_89.alt: Gizmo the cat looking sleepily up at the camera while resting on a chair covered in a fluffy blanket and leaning against the fluffy inner of a hoodie draped over the back of the chair.

image_90.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing inside a large plastic shopping bag, looking at the camera with enormous eyes.

image_91.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat caught mid-lick while licking his nose.

image_92.alt: Top down close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he's curled up asleep on a pile of colourful socks, with a paw covering his face.

image_93.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on his blue knitted mat next to a window, licking one of his front paws.

image_94.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face smushed against the side of the blue laundry basket he's lying in.

image_95.alt: Gizmo the cat's paw resting on top of Mark's hand on the couch.

image_96.alt: Gizmo the cat lying sleepily on his side on his blue knitted mat, next to a curtain backlit by sunlight.

image_97.alt: Gizmo the cat snoozing on his blue knitted mat next to a window, with one paw curled up in front of him and the other stretched out.

image_98.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on a blue blanket wrapped over Mark's lap, looking up at the camera.

image_99.alt: Slightly blurry photo of Gizmo the cat sitting alertly on the carpet with large eyes, looking up and to the left.

image_100.alt: Gizmo the cat enjoying belly rubs while lying on Mark's legs on the couch.

image_101.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on some laundry in a blue laundry basket in the sunlight.

image_102.alt: Gizmo the cat stretching his paw out through a gap in the bars on the side of the blue laundry basket he's curled up in.

image_103.alt: Gizmo the cat lying along Mark's legs on the couch, sleeping.

image_104.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on a blue blanket stretched over Mark's lap, looking at the camera with his belly turned up.

image_105.alt: Gizmo the cat lying with his belly turned up on a blue blanket stretched over Mark's lap, looking content as he gets full on belly rubs.

image_106.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on a blue blanket in the crook of Mark's arm, with his front paws stretched out to rest on Mark's hand.

image_107.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a blue blanket with his eyes open and his cheeks squished from the way he is lying.

image_108.alt: Side view of Gizmo the cat lying on Mark's legs on the couch, looking sleepily at the camera with one paw stretched off the side.

image_109.alt: Gizmo the the cat lying on a blue blanket with both paws stretched out towards the camera.

image_110.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on a small set of shelves next to a glass door, looking at the camera. The light outside is unusually orange.

image_111.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping on his blue knitted mat, with one paw stretched out towards the camera.

image_112.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping on a blue blanket on Mark's lap, lit by a warm light with both his front paws stretched out ahead of him and crossing over one another.

image_113.alt: Gizmo the cat rubbing his face against Mark's chin, with his tail in a question mark shape.

image_114.alt: Gizmo the cat enjoying belly rubs while lying on Mark's legs on the couch.

image_115.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on Mark's legs on the couch, with both paws stretched off the side so they rest just off the edge of the couch.

image_116.alt: Gizmo the cat looking at the camera from Mark's desk, as viewed through a small gap in his bedroom door. Only half of Gizmo's face is visible.

image_117.alt: Gizmo yawning widely while lying on Mark's legs, with slight motion blur visible on his body.

image_118.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on a chair, looking up and to the left.

image_119.alt: Top down view of Gizmo the cat curled up in a full laundry basket, with a blue blanket covering part of it.

image_120.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he sleeps on Mark's legs on the couch, with both front paws stretched out in front of him.

image_121.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing in front of the curtain, looking alertly past the camera.

image_122.alt: Gizmo the cat sleeping very peacefully on Mark's legs on the couch, with Mark's hand resting on him.

image_123.alt: Distant photo of Gizmo the cat's face peeking out from the darkness of a large plastic shopping bag on the floor, looking at the camera.

image_124.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on the end of the couch, side on to the camera.

image_125.alt: Gizmo the cat standing on the back of the couch, giving Mark a head bump as he lies on the couch.

image_126.alt: Gizmo the cat sniffing Mark's fingers with his ears back.

image_127.alt: Blurry photo of Gizmo with large eyes standing up on his hind legs with his face too close to the camera and one paw reached out past it.

image_128.alt: Gizmo the cat standing up on his hind legs, with one paw gently holding Mark's hand in place, as he's about to eat a treat from between Mark's fingers.

image_129.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on Mark's legs on the couch, looking alertly back towards the window behind him.

image_130.alt: Side view of Gizmo the cat licking his paw clean while he lies along Mark's legs on the couch.

image_131.alt: Gizmo the cat walking along the back of the couch towards the camera, slightly motion blurred. His tail is in a question mark shape.

image_132.alt: Top down view of Gizmo the cat lying on a blue blanket over Mark's lap, with both his front paws stretched off the side as he watches out the window.

image_133.alt: Motion blurred photo of Gizmo walking out of a cardboard box towards the camera

image_134.alt: Gizmo the cat standing inside a cardboard box, sniffing a corner of the upper flap.

image_135.alt: Gizmo the cat loafing right in front of the screen door, watching the outside

image_136.alt: Gizmo the cat crouching inside a cardboard box, watching the camera.

image_137.alt: Gizmo the cat playing with a track and ball toy, watching the toy while he has one of his arms pushed into the track.

image_138.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on a blue blanket with his head towards the camera, but his eyes looking off to the left. None of his legs are visible.

image_139.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a red office chair, with his eyes open.

image_140.alt: Gizmo the cat rolled right onto his back, getting belly rubs while lying on Mark's legs on the couch. His lip is pulled back a little, showing one tooth.

image_141.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up tightly on a red office chair, with one paw over his head and his eyes closed.

image_142.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on a blue blanket in a warm light, with his eyes open but his puffy cheeks smooshed against the blankets.

image_143.alt: Very dark photo of Gizmo the cat loafing beneath a bet, with huge eyes.

image_144.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting in the sunlight on top of a cat tower, looking up past the camera.

image_145.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on Mark's legs on the couch, with both front paws stretched off the side to rest on the couch.

image_146.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a black blanket, showing his belly with his eyes just barely open.

image_147.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he lies in the afternoon sun on the carpet next to the couch.

image_148.alt: Gizmo the cat lying in the afternoon sun on the carpet next to the couch, watching the outside through a glass door.

image_149.alt: Low angle photo of Gizmo the cat in a very tight loaf on the carpet, with his front paws completely hidden.

image_150.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a red office chair with his head held up but his eyes closed.

image_151.alt: Top down view of Gizmo the cat sitting on a fluffy blanket draped over a chair, looking up at the camera.

image_152.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on a red office chair in the sunlight, with his belly turned up and one paw stretched out while he's mid-yawn.

image_153.alt: Close up photo of Gizmo the cat snoozing in the hammock at the top of a cat tower, with the sun shining through a window behind him.

image_154.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting regally on top of a cat tower with a window behind him.

image_155.alt: Close up shot of Gizmo the cat curled up in a shoebox, with his eyes open and his cheek smooshed against the side of the box.

image_156.alt: Gizmo the cat stretched out along Mark's legs on the couch, showing his spotted belly as he reaches towards Mark's spotted socks.

image_157.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on Mark's legs on the couch, looking up and back contentedly towards the camera.

image_158.alt: Top down view of Gizmo loafing in front of the screen door, watching the outside. There is a cobweb draped over his head and upper back.

image_159.alt: Gizmo the cat lying in the sunlight on a red office chair, with his belly rolled up as he looks at the camera past his curled paws.

image_160.alt: Gizmo the cat lying on a red office chair in partial sunlight, in the middle of a yawn.

image_161.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat sleeping in the sunlight with his head on a blanket.

image_162.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat lying on a blue blanket looking very awake and staring right into the camera, backlit by a bright part of the ceiling directly behind his head.

image_163.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up on a blanket in the sunlight, with his eyes just barely open.

image_164.alt: Gizmo the cat sitting on top of a small set of shelves, looking directly into the camera with large eyes.

image_165.alt: Gizmo the cat lying in the sunlight, partially in his hammock on top of a cat tower. His body is facing the camera but he is looking to the right, watching the outside through a window.

image_166.alt: Close up of Gizmo the cat's face as he lies in a partially sunlit cardboard box next to a toy mouse.

image_167.alt: Top down view of Gizmo the cat as he watched two small lizards sunning themselves on the pavement on the other side of a glass door.

image_168.alt: Gizmo the cat curled up behind Mark's knees on the couch, using Mark's leg as a chin cushion.

image_169.alt: Gizmo the cat looking very happy as he gets belly rubs while lying on Mark's legs on the couch.

image_170.alt: Gizmo the cat lying sleepily in a shoebox, breathing slowly.

replies.text: What do you think of my throne?
Did you see where that moth went?
Hi! 😺
Hope you're having a nice, relaxing day ☀
How much longer do I have to hold still?
Oh, there you are. Hello!
Oh no, baby photos 😹
I'm safe, I'm warm, I'm happy. I hope you are too 💖
...belly rubs?
I hope you're doing okay ❤
Ahhh so warm 🔥💛🔥
I'm so warm... I think I'm melting...
Love that afternoon sunlight ☀
So cozy ❤
I'm having a snooze 💤
Do you like my stripes? 🐅
Yes, those are rainbows in my fur 🌈
Afternoon snooze ☀💤
This is one of my favourite spots!
My ears are burning, was someone talking about me?
I have a great view from this window
Mark helps me explore the house sometimes
Does this look dramatic enough?
This couch gets so much sun in the afternoon 💛☀
Did you know I used to have golden eyes instead of green ones? It's true!
Can I please get some belly rubs?
This is a pretty good bag!
Mark knitted this mat for me, it's very comfy 💙
Oh, hello! You found my afternoon hiding spot
I'm so comfy right now, I never want to move
Hello! 💖
Shhh, don't tell Mark. I'm waiting to ambush him when he walks past
Afternoon naps in the sun with my best friend are my favourite thing 💖💖
Hi! I hope you're having a good day today
I like this new bag, much better than the old plastic ones were
FEED ME!
It's tunnel time 😺
This is a very good nap ☀💤💖
It's good to just stop for a while, occasionally. Please take a break if you need one ❤
I'm safe 🌈 I'm warm ☀ I'm happy 😻
Ambush time!
Welcome to my lair 😈
This is a nice warm spot on my nice comfy mat 💙
These books are giving me some weird dreams
Quiet! I think I heard something...
This jacket is super comfy
I'm trying to sleep... but you may pat me
Oh no my belly is so cold, someone should rub it to keep me warm.
It's dinner time, rightt?
You just woke me up, I think I deserve some treats for this interruption.
I love my tunnel 💜
This is one of my best perches.
I'm ready for my treat now please!
mlem
Do you ever think about how big the world is and get just a little scared?
I love the fire. It should be winter all the time, except without the cold.
It's nap time 💤
Monch!
My ambush is prepared 👿
I love this cosy sleeping spot 💙
☁🌈 Welcome to my cloud fortress ☀☁
The cosiest nest ever 💤☁💙
Mark sometimes says I don't fit in this box anymore, but I do! See?
Look on my Works, ye Mighty, and despair!
Yes, this is good and comfy.
Don't get up. This is comfy.
Bags are the best. They are an ambush spot, a hiding spot, and a napping spot. Perfect.
You're not going anywhere, are you?
Hello! 💕
You found my secret napping spot! Don't tell anyone, please.
I'm practising for the longest cat competition, what do you think?
I'm trying to sleep, please... 💤
You could rub my belly, you know. If you want... 💙
Cold 🐾
Being comfortable is important 💙☁
It's okay to sometimes just let the day pass you by
Isn't it nice to just sit with someone, sometimes?
Time. To. Play!
That's the stuff... a little to the left...
Very soft, I approve ☁
Your bars cannot contain me! 🚫
Yay, it's couch time 💤
Can I get some belly rubs please?
Full body belly rubs, yes!
I hope you're doing okay today, but it's alright if you're not 💙
But I'm not tiiiired!
Huh? Yeah I'm totally awake 💤
If you gaze long enough into the abyss, I hope you find a comfy cat curled up there
We can get through this 🧡
I hope you're half as comfy as I am right now
Time for a nice warm cuddle 💛🧡❤
It's important to greet people you love properly: with a head bump
Ahh, this is the life...
💤 dreaming about flying 💤
Are you spying on me? I see you there 👀
🏳️‍⚧️ TRANS RIGHTS!!
What do you mean, "your chair"?
This is a pretty good nest
What are you up to today?
Comfy and content 💕
I'm playing hide and seek... can you find me?
Do you think it'll be dinner time soon?
Take it from an expert, head bumps are one of the best ways to show affection
If you ever meet me, please let me smell your hand before you pat me ❤
Coming in for a head bump!
A treat hell yeah!
It's couch time and I get to watch the outside. I love it when two great things come together 💕
Nap time can be bath time too
You better be ready for a head bump
What do you think of my snail impression? 🐌
🎶 Coming out of my box and I've been doing just fine 🎵
It's very important to inspect every part of a new box
This is my favourite show, what's yours?
Oh, you found me! Do you like my box?
You won't escape this time, ball!
I'm so relaxed I feel like I'm melting into this blanket...
Have you never seen rainbow whiskers before? 🌈
Did you know belly rubs are my favourite? But only when I'm really comfy and relaxed
My heart is very full 💕❤💖
I'm not tired, you're tired!
Do you ever just want to hide from everything for a while?
Hope you've got some time in the sun recently ☀
It's very important that I put at least one paw on the couch during couch time. Two is ideal
Shhh I'm sleep 💤
Let's get lost in thought together
Watched any good shows lately?
Excuse me, have you seen my legs? I seem to have misplaced them
Sometimes all you need is a comfy spot in the sun ☀
"Your chair"? Excuse me, but this blanket clearly marks it as mine.

RUB MY BELLY!

gently though please
This perch is a great place to give head bumps from
I definitely fit, what are you talking about?
Hey look, we have matching spots
My heart is very full 💕❤💖
Yes, I have been exploring. How did you know?
Could I maybe get some belly rubs? Please?
Can I get some PATS please!?
Oh, you're getting up? Is it breakfast time???
Shhh, sleeping time 💤
Could I sit on your lap for a while, please?
I think today is going to be okay ❤
It's hard to beat a good box

Look! I found some friends!

Hello friends!
Hey. Don't move. You're my chin pillow now.
I'm safe and warm and happy 😸
You're allowed to take a break 💕

posts.text: Hi! 😺
I'm safe, I'm warm, I'm happy. I hope you are too 💖
...belly rubs?
I'm having a snooze 💤
Do you like my stripes? 🐅
Yes, those are rainbows in my fur 🌈
Does this look dramatic enough?
Can I please get some belly rubs?
This is a pretty good bag!
Hi! I hope you're having a good day today
It's good to just stop for a while, occasionally. Please take a break if you need one ❤
Oh no my belly is so cold, someone should rub it to keep me warm.
Do you ever think about how big the world is and get just a little scared?
☁🌈 Welcome to my cloud fortress ☀☁
The cosiest nest ever 💤☁💙
Bags are the best. They are an ambush spot, a hiding spot, and a napping spot. Perfect.
Hello! 💕
I'm practising for the longest cat competition, what do you think?
You could rub my belly, you know. If you want... 💙
Mmmm that was a good treat!
One of my favourite little views.
Sunbeam stretch ☀
I love watching the outdoors. There's lizards and birds and bugs out there.
Yum yum my morning treat
There's something on the wind today...
Hammock snooze time 💤
Finally, some belly rubs
Maybe if I turn my head upside down I could curl even tighter
Morning treat yes please!
Is it time for my treat?
Comfy scarves 🧣
Don't you wish you had a tail this comfy?
Dreaming of something big
My two favourite textures, right next to my favourite view. I could grow old in this chair
I have the biggest eyes, no competition
Always a good time for a mlem
These socks... they are mine
Bath time
Of course this is comfortable, why do you ask?
Are you doing okay today? Take some time for yourself if you need it 💕
Being comfortable is important 💙☁
It's okay to sometimes just let the day pass you by
Isn't it nice to just sit with someone, sometimes?
Time. To. Play!
That's the stuff... a little to the left...
Very soft, I approve ☁
Your bars cannot contain me! 🚫
Yay, it's couch time 💤
Can I get some belly rubs please?
Full body belly rubs, yes!
